CONCLUSION: No violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Degrading treatment) (Substantive aspect)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . According to the applicant , prior to the initiation of the criminal proceedings against him and his detention , he had no major medical problems and was in good health .
